channel.title: On a Rail: please make glass breakable from grenades
channel.description:
Map: bm_c2a2c getpos: setpos 1862.915161 -1322.919678 272.031250;setang 5.870791 102.982544 0.000000
When I'm about to enter that control room to launch the rocket, I'd really like to throw a grenade through the glass, but that doesn't work. The glass only breaks when I shoot it. Can you please change that? ![2016-01-23_00002.jpg|690x500](upload://iGVV8dHMEnO4v7ZjKQWRjW8eZHK.jpeg)

item.title: On a Rail: please make glass breakable from grenades
item.dc:creator: djcj
item.description:
Map: bm_c2a2c
getpos: setpos 1862.915161 -1322.919678 272.031250;setang 5.870791 102.982544 0.000000

When I’m about to enter that control room to launch the rocket, I’d really like to throw a grenade through the glass, but that doesn’t work. The glass only breaks when I shoot it. Can you please change that?

2016-01-23_00002.jpg1280×720 81.6 KB

Read full topic
item.source: On a Rail: please make glass breakable from grenades
